LanguageData.GeothermalPower.label: geothermal power
LanguageData.GeothermalPower.description: Allows you to build geothermal power plants on top of steam geysers, for uninterrupted power.
LanguageData.Hydroponics.label: hydroponics
LanguageData.Hydroponics.description: Allows you to build hydroponics tables to rapidly grow crops indoors regardless of the terrain or weather outside.
LanguageData.Brewing.label: brewing
LanguageData.Brewing.description: Allows you to build a brewery to transform hops into tasty, tasty beer.
LanguageData.PneumaticPicks.label: pneumatic picks
LanguageData.Stonecutting.label: stonecutting
LanguageData.Stonecutting.description: Build stonecutting tables, which allow you to refine rock chunks into stone blocks that can be used for construction.
LanguageData.ElectricSmelting.label: electric smelting
LanguageData.ElectricSmelting.description: Build electic smelters which use heat and strong electromagnets to extract useful metal from slag chunks and other items.
LanguageData.Machining.label: machining
LanguageData.Machining.description: Build machining tables to disassemble dead mechanoids into usable metal.
LanguageData.NutrientResynthesis.label: nutrient resynthesis
LanguageData.NutrientResynthesis.description: Nutrient paste dispensers consume 10% less food per meal produced.
LanguageData.GunTurretCooling.label: gun turret cooling
LanguageData.GunTurretCooling.description: Gun turrets fire four shots in a burst instead of three.
LanguageData.Mortars.label: mortars
LanguageData.Mortars.description: Learn to build mortars which can lob shells long distances over walls.
LanguageData.Cremation.label: cremation
LanguageData.Cremation.description: Build crematoriums which can vaporize unwanted corpses.
LanguageData.CarpetMaking.label: carpet making
LanguageData.CarpetMaking.description: Allows colonists to build carpets to increase the quality of their environments.
LanguageData.ColoredLights.label: colored lights
LanguageData.ColoredLights.description: Allows collonists to construct colored lights for decorative purposes.
LanguageData.HospitalBed.label: hospital bed
LanguageData.HospitalBed.description: Allows collonists to construct hospital beds which increase chance of successful medical work.
LanguageData.Cryptosleep.label: cryptosleep casket
LanguageData.Cryptosleep.description: Allows colonists to construct cryptosleep caskets, which can put living beings in a state of suspended animation.
